title: (x) Orlando Hamilton Floral Design - Times {Minimalista}
content:
Hi,   
Can someone please identify this typeface for me! (It's a fax copy so sorry about the quality)   
Any help MUCH appreciated.   
   
 ![Orlando Hamilton Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121123133im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47581.gif)

 [‹ Just for fun. GO for it](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121123133/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6326 "Go to previous forum topic") [Bauer Bodoni ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121123133/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6365 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pbags

comments.content:
It looks like a version of Times. Does the top of the tail in the "R" have a notch in it or is that a result of the fax?   
   
The width of the small caps letters arent the same in this sample, but it's close:   
   
http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/times/bold-small-caps-and-old-style-figures/testdrive.html?s=Orlando+Hamilton&p=48
